dcterms:description: This dataset was collected from the YouTube video platform by searching keywords of Werewolf social deduction game. It contains 151 games of One Night Ultimate Werewolf, which corresponds to 151 separate videos with 14.8 hours. It consists of videos, transcripts, player roles, voting outcomes, and persuasion strategy labels. The transcripts comprise 20,832 utterances.
dcterms:title: YouTube Dataset

dcterms:description: This Ego4D dataset is a subset of Ego4D Social dataset. It has 40 games of One Night Ultimate Werewolf and 8 games of The Resistance: Avalon. It contains 101 separate videos with 7.3 hours. Among them, we leverage 83 videos where we can visually identify individuals for new data annotations. It also consists of videos, transcripts, player roles, voting outcomes, and persuasion strategy labels. The transcripts contain 5,815 utterances during the games.
dcterms:title: Ego4D Dataset
